code: import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import startBirdImage from"../../assets/startBird.jpg";import AudioPlayer from"../audio";import{selectIsCorrectCurrentBird,selectSelectedBird}from"../../redux/birds/selectors";import"./styles.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CurrentQuestion=function CurrentQuestion(_ref){var image=_ref.image,name=_ref.name,audio=_ref.audio;var isCorrectCurrentBird=useSelector(selectIsCorrectCurrentBird);var selectedBird=useSelector(selectSelectedBird);var START_NAME_OF_THE_HIDDEN_BIRD="******";var imageIfSelectedBirdExist=selectedBird&&selectedBird.name===name?image:startBirdImage;var nameIfSelectedBirdExist=selectedBird&&selectedBird.name===name?name:START_NAME_OF_THE_HIDDEN_BIRD;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"current-question",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(isCorrectCurrentBird?image:imageIfSelectedBirdExist),className:"bird-image",alt:"bird"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bird-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"name",children:"".concat(isCorrectCurrentBird?name:nameIfSelectedBirdExist)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AudioPlayer,{audio:audio})]})]});};export default CurrentQuestion;
